name: Redshift VR
description:
Destroy crystals, unlock abilities, and unleash power-ups! Redshift VR will test your skills at precision and accuracy as you battle to stop your targets from reaching their destination. Throw discs with the right direction and speed to shatter crystals and earn points and medals. Can you reach the end?

Features
  • 8 unique power-ups, including: multi-disc, shockwave, and lightning
  • Unlockable skills that are earned by gaining experience points
  • 3 difficulties to master
  • Online leaderboards for all difficulties
  • Medals to earn and fill out your medal chest
  • Secrets to find and unlock
